question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-server-framework/src/lib.rs] [Function: register_probes_and_metrics_handler()] [Port Binding Race] Can an attacker bind to the health_check_port before the warp server starts at line 257/261, causing the indexer to fail startup without proper error handling?
